body.p: You can use foreground images to impose a texture above entire pages.
Usually those foreground images contains watermarks (for example "Draft", "Copyright" or "Do Not Copy"). Here is an example of how can you do it for all the pages:

ul.li: Make sure to use an image type that supports transparency.
It is better to use SVG for the page artworks as they do not suffer from pixelation and because foreground images are stretched to the whole page size.
